name: Yokai - The curse of time bending
name_original: Yokai - The curse of time bending
description:
YOKAI - The curse of time bending

Play as a samurai that seeks to control the power of time bending in this top-down roguelite dungeon crawler made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme REWIND!

Art by PlumPanda / https://plumpanda.itch.io/ / Ninja Panda(poyo)!!!#1578

Programmed and Designed by The Fifth King / https://www.twitch.tv/thefifthking
